description:
The official Rainbocorns colouring-in game and Webisodes!

Rainbocorns comes with 50 re-usable digital colouring-in pages which you can colour-in using  either your finger or a stylus. You can also zoom in, out and move the image around to get the perfect coloured in picture and you can save and share your pictures by using the capture button on the left Joy-Conâ„¢.

As a bonus we have included all the series one webisodes into the game,  so now you can watch  all eight webisodes,  anytime,  anywhere.
name: Rainbocorns
